RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: hello@sinedub.io
RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Reorganize Env
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Provides a keyboard shortcut that sees to it that unused envelopes from envelopes.xrnt are minimized and deactivated. Also has an option for a second shortcut that just minimizes all deactivated, or all deactivated and external, devices in the current chain at once.
